definitions.definition: A lifting of the shoulders to signal indifference or a casual lack of knowledge.
definitions.example: He dismissed my comment with a shrug.

definitions.definition: A cropped, cardigan-like garment with short or long sleeves, typically knitted.
To raise (the shoulders) to express uncertainty, lack of concern, (formerly) dread, etc.
definitions.example: I asked him for an answer and he just shrugged.
